    Best regards, Alice'

args.subject: Welcome to Blue Sparrow Tech, David!
args.body:
Hi David,

Welcome to Blue Sparrow Tech — we're excited to have you join the marketing team! I'm Emma Johnson from the team. If there's anything you need as you get settled (access, introductions, or setup), please let me know and I'll help however I can.

Looking forward to working with you.

Best regards,
Emma Johnson
emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com
